triples.name: Syntax
triples.relevance: UCCA builds upon syntactic structures as a foundation for semantic representation.

triples.name: Semantics
triples.relevance: UCCA is a novel framework designed to capture semantic distinctions in linguistic utterances.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: UCCA is developed for semantic applications in natural language processing.

triples.name: Text annotation
triples.relevance: UCCA introduces a novel annotation framework that can be learned by non-linguistic annotators.

triples.name: Corpus linguistics
triples.relevance: The paper describes compilation of a UCCA-annotated corpus for linguistic research.

triples.name: Abstract Meaning Representation
triples.relevance: AMR is a related semantic representation framework that UCCA builds upon for multi-layered semantic analysis.
